name: Recapitate
description:
Recapitate is a game made in 48 hours for the Ludum Dare 39 compo.

Ludum Dare page: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/39/recapitate

In Recapitate, you play a demon wreaking havoc on the mortal world. But you cannot maintain your corporeal form for long, so you must feast on the flesh of man to sustain yourself. Launch your head at foes to devour them. Rip and tear until it is done!

CONTROLS:

Arrow Keys - Move

X - Jump

C - Attack

DIFFICULTY OPTIONS:

Change the difficulty to make the timer go slower or faster.

O - Lower difficulty (if you're having trouble)

P - Raise difficulty (for veteran players only)

The default difficulty is recommended for all first time players.

TOOLS:

Eclipse

Tiled

Paint.net

BFXR

Audacity

Bosca Ceoil
